backend/main.mo: Motoko backend defining user profiles, surgery case types, authorization checks, and CRUD operations with per-user case storage.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, involved files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries of numerous frontend source files.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_NOTES.md: Deployment notes detailing a TypeScript build error, its root cause, fixes applied, and step-by-step redeployment instructions.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global stylesheet defining color variables, theming rules, and base styles for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file mounting the React app and loading the main TypeScript entry module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React application component handling authentication, profile setup, case listing, case form modals, search, and sorting UI.
frontend/src/components/cases/CameraCapt: Provides a camera interface to start, stop, switch, retry, and capture photos, returning a data URL on success. Handles cleanup, errors, and loading states.
frontend/src/components/cases/CaseCard.t: Displays key details of a surgery case with edit capability and a tasks checklist. Updates task changes locally and on the server.
frontend/src/components/cases/CaseForm.t: Form for creating or editing surgery cases with demographics, dates, tasks, and optional image capture. Supports prefill, validation, and saving to local and server stores.
frontend/src/components/cases/CaseList.t: Lists surgery cases with filtering, sorting, and empty states. Integrates authentication, backend connection, and online status checks.
Combined input and calendar picker for selecting dates in YYYY-MM-DD format. Validates input and syncs with parent state.
frontend/src/components/cases/Demographi: Provides a text area and optional camera capture to quickly input demographic data. Manages camera dialog, errors, and image preview/removal.
frontend/src/components/cases/EmptyCases: Displays an empty-state message for cases, with optional migration guidance and dynamic messaging based on auth and connectivity.
frontend/src/components/cases/SortContro: Provides UI controls to select a sort field and toggle ascending or descending order.
frontend/src/components/cases/TasksCheck: Renders a normalized tasks checklist with checkboxes and handles task toggle updates.
frontend/src/components/csv/CsvExportBut: Exports all stored cases to a CSV file and triggers a download with basic error handling.
frontend/src/components/csv/CsvImportDia: Allows users to upload and parse a CSV, preview warnings/errors, and import cases into the store.
frontend/src/components/errors/ModalErro: Catches errors inside modal content and shows a recovery UI with logging and reset handling.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Displays a footer with attribution, current year, and a referral link.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Shows the app header with branding and login/logout controls tied to Internet Identity.
frontend/src/components/startup/StartupR: Shows a recovery screen for startup errors with guidance and retry/reload actions.
frontend/src/components/sync/SyncStatusB: Displays online, backend, and sync status with retry and sync controls using various hooks.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the userâ€™s identity and refreshes dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorWithError.ts: Wraps useActor to detect initialization failures, track errors, and provide retry behavior.
Combines identity, actor state, and connectivity probing to expose unified backend connection status with retry.
frontend/src/hooks/useCasesStore.ts: Loads, merges, and manages surgery cases across local storage and server with add/update/delete/import mutations.
frontend/src/hooks/useEnvironmentLabel.t: Derives a Draft or Live environment label based on hostname heuristics.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, identity loading, login/logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useOnlineStatus.ts: Tracks browser online/offline status using navigator events.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles and surgery cases with authorization-aware error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useSync.ts: Implements local-to-server case sync workflow, merging, normalizing, and persisting cases with error handling.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables for light and dark modes and base styling.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Provides a utility function for merging Tailwind class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app root with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/types/cases.ts: Type definitions for local surgery cases and form data extending backend models.
Classifies backend errors into user-friendly categories and formats initialization errors.
frontend/src/utils/csv.ts: CSV import/export utilities for surgery cases with validation, parsing, and task column handling.
frontend/src/utils/dates.ts: Timezone-safe utilities for converting, validating, and formatting date-only strings and nanoseconds.
frontend/src/utils/draftAdminToken.ts: Retrieves and checks the draft admin token from URL parameters or session storage.
frontend/src/utils/localPersistence.ts: Handles saving, loading, and clearing surgery cases in localStorage with BigInt-safe serialization and normalization.
frontend/src/utils/mergeCases.ts: Merges local and server surgery cases, preserving local-only fields, and prepares pending changes for sync.
frontend/src/utils/prefill.ts: Finds the latest case matching an MRN and extracts demographic prefill data from it.
frontend/src/utils/tasksChecklist.ts: Defines task metadata and utilities for creating, normalizing, updating, and querying task checklists.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and cleaning hash parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS theme, colors, animations, and plugins for the frontend.
project_state.json: Describes project metadata, known issues, features, and pending requests for the Surgery Case Tracker.
